Name: Professor CatBox
Description: Hailing from the digital alleyways of WebtrES club, Professor CatBox is an enigmatic scholar known for his unparalleled wit and feline grace. His classic box body is a nod to the retro tech that inspired his creation, while his cat-themed screen, buttons, and limbs hint at his agile and playful nature. Always seen with his signature glasses, he's the go-to expert for all things tech and trivia in the club. Whether he's lounging on a sunny windowsill debugging code or sipping on a saucer of milk while reading the latest data streams, Professor CatBox is the embodiment of intellect with a purr-fect touch of whimsy.
